quiz.text: Which of the following ministries/organizations has/have launched National Action Plan for Dog Mediated Rabies Elimination (NAPRE) from India by 2030?
options: Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
World Health Organization
1 and 2
1 and 3

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), LaQshya has been mentioned in the Parliament. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ‘LaQshya’?

A.      It was launched in the year 2017.

B.      ‘LaQshya’ stands for ‘Labour Room Quality Improvement Initiative’.

C.      Initiative targets only high case load Community Health Centers (CHCs).
options: A only
A and B
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, the Prime Minister has addressed the One World TB Summit at Rudrakash Convention Centre in ___________.
options: Mumbai
New Delhi
Varanasi
Ujjain
Kurukshetra

quiz.text: New shorter treatment regimen for TB Preventative Therapy has been launched at the event. Under this method, drugs have to be taken only _________ for 12 weeks instead of the earlier regimen of one drug every day for 6 months.
options: twice a week
once a fortnight
thrice a week
once a week
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the initiatives to promote medical tourism were mentioned in Parliament. Under the ‘Heal in India’ initiative, Ministry of Health and Family Welfare and ___________ have been working with _____________ and Services Export Promotion Council (SEPC) for developing a ‘One Step’ Heal in India portal for Promotion of Medical Value Travel.
options: Ministry of Ayush; C-DAC
Ministry of Tourism; C-DAC
Ministry of Tourism; NIC
Ministry of Culture; C-DAC
Ministry of Ayush; NIC

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Government of India has provided _______ exemption from basic customs duty on all drugs and Food for Special Medical Purposes imported for personal use for treatment of all Rare Diseases listed under the National Policy for Rare Diseases 2021.
options: 60%
25%
50%
80%
100%

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), the Union Minister of Health and Family Welfare has chaired the 36th Board Meeting of Stop TB Partnership. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Stop TB Partnership?

A.      The Stop TB Partnership is a hosted entity of the UNICEF.

B.      It was launched in 1995.

C.      Its mandate involves bringing together 1,600 partner organizations across the world to lead global advocacy towards ending tuberculosis (TB).
options: A and B
B and C
C only
B only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), information has been shared by minister of state for Environment, Forest and Climate change (MoEFCC) regarding the Eco-sensitive zones and Ecologically Sensitive Areas. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Eco-Sensitive Zones?
options: ESZs are declared by the State Government.
The National Wildlife Action Plan (2002-2016) of the MoEFCC stipulates the Eco-sensitive zones.
Extent of Area of ESZs is land falling within 10 km of the boundaries of national parks and wildlife sanctuaries.
Felling of Trees is prohibited in ESZs.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Union Minister for Environment, Forest and Climate Change has launched Aravalli Green Wall Project, a major initiative to green 5 km buffer area around the Aravalli Hill Range in four states. Which of the following is not one of the four states/UTs under the project?
options: Haryana
Rajasthan
Madhya Pradesh
Gujarat
Delhi

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Project Cheetah?

A.      It is the world's first intercontinental large wild carnivore translocation project.

B.      First batch of eight cheetahs (five females and three males) arrived from South Africa.

C.      Cheetahs are being introduced at Kuno National Park, Rajasthan.
options: A and B
C only
A and C
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to PARIVESH Portal?
options: It is Designed, developed and hosted by the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC).
Technical support is provided by the National Informatics Centre (NIC).
Its beneficiaries are District, State, and Central Governments and not private companies.
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Union Minister of Housing and Urban Affairs has addressed the ‘Swachhotsav-2023: Rally for Garbage-free cities’. The government has a target of at least __________ 3-Star Garbage free cities by October, 2024.
options: 5,000
10,000
1,000
8,000
2,000

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), a reply has been submitted by Minister of State for the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MoSPI) regarding the SDG. Sustainable Development Goals comprises of 17 goals and ______ targets.
options: 169
85
124
251
137

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, the Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) on the GeM has crossed __________ in 2022–23.
options: Rs 1 lakh crore
Rs 1.25 lakh crore
Rs 1.5 lakh crore
Rs 3 lakh crore
Rs 2 lakh crore

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, which of the following will fill in ___(A)___ and ___(B)_____space?
options: 5,000; rural and urban
10,000; urban
7,500; rural
15,000; rural and sub-urban
7,500; rural and sub-urban

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, which of the following will fill in ___(C)___ space?
options: 33%
20%
50%
75%
40%

quiz.text: Which of the following benefits of e-shram card is/are incorrect?
options: e-SHRAM will be acceptable across the country.
Accidental Insurance Coverage through PM SBY for lifetime.
Rs 2 lakh for accidental death and permanent disability.
Rs 1 lakh for partial disability
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the ‘Captive Employment’ initiative?
options: It is an initiative of Ministry of MSME.
It is an initiative under Deen Dayal Upadhaya Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-DKY).
Captive Employers are required to provide captive employment to a minimum of 70% of trained candidates for 6 months.
Guidelines ensure the RTD (Recruit, Train and Deploy) model.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), a reply has been submitted by Minister of state for Social justice and Empowerment regarding the de-addiction Programme. Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyan was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2014
2020
2016
2017
2019

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), information has been shared by Union Minister of Minority Affairs regarding Wheat based nutrition Programme. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Wheat based nutrition Programme?
options: It was launched in 1986.
It is a centrally sponsored scheme.
Nodal Ministry is Ministry of Women and Child Development.
Beneficiaries include children of pre-school age, nursing and expectant mothers in disadvantaged areas with high IMR.
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), an update is shared by Union Minister of Law and Justice regarding the fund allocation and utilization towards DISHA. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to DISHA?

A.      DISHA stands for Designing Innovative Solutions for Holistic Access to Justice.

B.      It has been launched for a period of five years (2021-2026).

C.      It aims to secure “Justice” to the people of India as enunciated in the Preamble and under Articles 44A, 14 and 21 of the Constitution of India.
options: C only
A and B
A, B and C
A and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), information regarding Project ADVAIT has been shared. Project ADVAIT was launched by which of the following organizations/ministries?
options: NITI Aayog
CII and NITI Aayog
Ministry of AYUSH
Ministry of Commerce and Industry
Central Board for Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC)

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), last date for linking PAN-Aadhaar has been extended to_______.
options: 30th September 2023
30th June 2023
31st March 2024
31st December 2023
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Ministry of Panchayati Raj (MoPR) and the National Informatics Centre (NIC) have been awarded for the AuditOnline application under Category 7 — Action Line (AL) C7 — ICT Applications. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ‘AuditOnline’ application?
options: Launched by Ministry of Panchayati Raj.
Launched as a part of Panchayat Enterprise Suite under ePanchayat Mission Mode Project.
It carries out online audit of all Panchayati Raj Institutions (PRIs)
The application can be configured as per every States’ Audit Act / Rules.
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the First Meeting of G20-Chief Science Advisers Roundtable (G20-CSAR) has been held at which of the following places?
options: Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh
Ramnagar, Uttarakhand
Bengaluru, Karnataka
Indore, Madhya Pradesh
New Delhi, Delhi

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Minister of State for Ministry of MSME has shared an information regarding registration of MSME on the Udyam Portal. Which of the following is/are the implementing agency(s) for the development of Udyam Assistant Platform (UAP)?
options: CII
SIDBI
FICCI
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: According to latest data from the Ministry of Commerce & Industry, more than 400 companies have been registered on Unified Logistics Interface Platform (ULIP). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ULIP?
options: It was launched in 2022.
It was launched under National Logistics Policy.
It aims to bring ease of doing business in the logistics sector.
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Govt. of India in consultation with the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has finalized its borrowing Programme for the 1st half of FY 2023-24. Out of Gross Market borrowing of Rs 15.43 lakh cr. Projected for FY 2023-24 in the union Budget, __________is planned to be barrowed in first half.
options: Rs 6.88 lakh cr
Rs 7.88 lakh cr
Rs 10.88 lakh cr
Rs 5.88 lakh cr
Rs 8.88 lakh cr

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, which of the following is the prospective member of New Development Bank (NDB)?
options: Uruguay
Argentina
Indonesia
Nigeria
Egypt

quiz.text: According to recent data by the Ministry of Finance, Public Sector Banks (PSBs) have written off Rs 91,000 crore in first 9 months of FY23. Which of the following are the top 3 PSBs with highest written off amounts?
options: SBI, PNB and Bank of Baroda
SBI, Union Bank of India and Bank of Baroda
SBI, Canara Bank and Bank of Baroda
SBI, Bank of India and Bank of Baroda
None of the above
